member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason
member.summary: Enumeration representing the reasons for disconnection in the networking layer.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.Unknown
member.summary: The disconnection reason is unknown.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.CantConnectServer
member.summary: The client was unable to connect to the server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.MaxSession
member.summary: The maximum number of sessions has been reached.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.InvalidOperationHandshake
member.summary: The operation handshake was invalid.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.MaxSessionPerUser
member.summary: The maximum number of sessions per user has been reached.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.HandshakeTimeout
member.summary: The handshake operation timed out.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.IdleTimeout
member.summary: The connection was idle for too long and timed out.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.DisconnectReason.DisconnectByClient
member.summary: The client disconnected intentionally.

member.summary: Represents a Ping operation in the networking layer, typically used to check connectivity or latency.

member.summary: Represents a Pong operation in the networking layer, typically used as a response to a Ping.

member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.ReturnCode
member.summary: Static class containing return codes for various network operations.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.ReturnCode.Ok
member.summary: The operation completed successfully.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.ReturnCode.OperationTimeout
member.summary: The operation timed out.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.ReturnCode.OperationInvalid
member.summary: The operation was invalid.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.ReturnCode.OperationInvalidInServer
member.summary: The operation was invalid when performed on the server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.ReturnCode.OperationNotAuthorized
member.summary: The operation was not authorized.

member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendParameters
member.summary: Struct representing parameters used during a send operation.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendParameters.ChannelId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the channel through which the data is sent.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendParameters.Unreliable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data is sent unreliably.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendParameters.Encrypted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data should be encrypted.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendParameters.Immediately
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data should be sent immediately.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendParameters.Sync
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the operation should be synchronous.

member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult
member.summary: Enumeration representing the result of a send operation.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult.Ok
member.summary: The operation completed successfully.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult.Disconnected
member.summary: The connection was disconnected.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult.SendBufferFull
member.summary: The send buffer is full, preventing the operation from completing.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult.MessageTooBig
member.summary: The message is too large to be sent.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult.SessionNull
member.summary: The session is null, indicating an invalid or missing session.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult.EncryptionNotSupported
member.summary: The operation failed because encryption is not supported.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNet.Networking.SendResult.Failed
member.summary: The send operation failed due to an unspecified error.
